result.eng: You will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ga: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.orig: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaile
result.html: Muirfear thú ach tú ag gabháil 'un an bhaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.
result.ponchtml: Muirfear ṫú aċ tú ag gaḃáil 'un an ḃaileYou will be killed if you show your face in town.
